recipesJson.name: Crimson Cupcake
recipesJson.author: ZestyVapes
recipesJson.description: This is my take on a Strawberry Cupcake, I really wanted to focus on the entire cupcake and not just certain parts of the profile. This Recipie does need some time to get its full potential of flavor. I reccomend 3-5 day steep. This is an ADV for me.

reviews.text: Good recipe i steeped for 2 weeks to get more of a cream cheese note
